description_for_human: Link a GitHub repository and ask about any aspect of the code. This AI-powered plugin serves as your personal code interpreter, simplifying complex code and boosting productivity.
description_for_model: This plugin analyzes github repository provided by the user and then tries to answer users questions related to this repository. It accepts the link to the repository from the user. The first step is to analyze the structure of the repository. The response is the list of all files that are present in the repository. Once the structure is analyzed, the content of 20 most relevant to user's question files should be requested to populate the context.
